name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Regains His Heart
keyMoments.description: Law receives his heart back from Smoker, restoring his full strength and combat capabilities.
keyMoments.significance: Critical turning point that allows Law to demonstrate his true power against Vergo.

keyMoments.title: Declaration of the New Era
keyMoments.description: Law declares to Doflamingo that the Eleven Supernovas will lead the new era, stating that he has 'broken the gear' of the old system.
keyMoments.significance: Major thematic declaration establishing the Worst Generation's role in reshaping the world.
keyMoments.quote: It's been two years since the War of the Best... Well, I broke the gear.

keyMoments.title: Law Defeats Vergo and Destroys SAD Chamber
keyMoments.description: Law cuts through Vergo's full-body Haki, bisecting him along with the SAD chamber and part of Punk Hazard island.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most impressive power displays in the series, proving Law surpassed Vergo and disrupting Doflamingo's SMILE operation.

abilities.description: Law creates a spherical territory where he can manipulate anything within it, including cutting through objects and people with surgical precision.
Law demonstrates Armament Haki powerful enough to cut through Vergo's full-body Haki coating.

relationships.description: Smoker helps Law by retrieving his heart from Vergo, creating a temporary alliance despite their opposing roles.

evolutionMoments.description: Smoker retrieves and returns Law's heart, enabling his victory over Vergo.

relationships.description: Law battles and defeats Vergo, who had been holding his heart and working for Doflamingo.

evolutionMoments.description: Law bisects Vergo with his Room ability, ending their battle.

reveals.information: Law's Haki and Devil Fruit mastery has grown strong enough to cut through advanced full-body Armament Haki
Law positions himself and the Eleven Supernovas as the force that will lead the new era and disrupt the old world order

keyMoments.title: Smoker Brutally Defeated by Vergo
keyMoments.description: Smoker is overwhelmed by Vergo's superior Haki and has his Nanashaku Jitte broken by the Oni Take technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the power gap between Smoker and top-tier Haki users while demonstrating his determination.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Retrieves Law's Heart
keyMoments.description: Despite his injuries, Smoker uses his abilities to retrieve Law's heart from Vergo and return it to the pirate.
keyMoments.significance: Major character moment showing Smoker's growth beyond rigid Marine justice and willingness to do what's right.
keyMoments.quote: Finish it quick. It shames me to be indebted to a pirate.

relationships.description: Smoker helps Law by returning his heart, creating a temporary alliance despite their opposing roles.

evolutionMoments.description: Smoker retrieves and returns Law's heart, helping him defeat Vergo.

relationships.description: Smoker battles Vergo, who is revealed to be a traitor within the Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Vergo defeats Smoker in battle, breaking his jitte.

reveals.information: Smoker shows willingness to help a pirate for the greater good, demonstrating growth beyond rigid Marine justice

keyMoments.title: Oni Take Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Vergo uses his signature Oni Take technique, imbuing his bamboo stick with Armament Haki to break Smoker's jitte.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Vergo's signature technique and his mastery of Armament Haki.

keyMoments.title: Full-Body Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Vergo demonstrates incredible Haki mastery by coating his entire body in jet-black Armament Haki.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most impressive displays of advanced Haki mastery shown up to this point in the series.

keyMoments.title: Vergo Defeated by Law
keyMoments.description: Despite his full-body Haki, Vergo is bisected by Law's attack along with the SAD chamber.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Law's power has surpassed even Vergo's advanced Haki techniques.

abilities.description: Vergo imbues his bamboo stick with Armament Haki and strikes down his foe with overwhelming force.
Vergo coats his entire body in jet-black Armament Haki, demonstrating advanced mastery of Busoshoku Haki.

relationships.description: Vergo battles Law and is ultimately defeated despite his advanced Haki.

evolutionMoments.description: Law bisects Vergo, ending their battle.

reveals.information: Vergo can coat his entire body in Armament Haki, demonstrating advanced Haki mastery

keyMoments.title: Caesar Warns Luffy About Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Caesar attempts to warn Luffy about the danger of Doflamingo and advises him to apologize.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the future conflict with Doflamingo while showing Luffy's determination.
keyMoments.quote: You don't understand who you're dealing with! Joker is not someone you can mess with!

keyMoments.title: Gastille Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Caesar uses his Gastille technique, shooting a beam of lit gas that can melt steel.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Caesar's offensive capabilities with his Gas-Gas Fruit.

abilities.description: Caesar shoots a beam of lit gas from his mouth that explodes on impact with temperatures hot enough to melt steel.
